## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GPDHp</u>
- **Gene Name:** Glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase plastidic
- **Description:**   NAD-dependent glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase family protein;(source:Araport11)
